column6: SPECIAL "PLANET X" FINALE! The final chapter in Grant Morrison's most ambitious story to date... Professor X and his X-Men make their final stand against MAGNETO, who was hiding under their noses disguised as team member XORN for months. And an X-Man dies in the showdown! 48 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$3.50 [note page count & price]
column8: | penciller (cover):Phil Jimenez | inker:Andy Lanning | writer:Grant Morrison
